means: 苦恼，埋怨( repine的现在分词 )

sentence.Network_en: Be still, sad heart! And cease repining, behind th clouds is the sun still shining.
sentence.Network_cn: 安静吧, 忧伤的心! 别再哀怨, 乌云背后太阳依然灿烂.

sentence.Network_en: The whole article revolves around the center of artistic style of Tang poetry of palace repining.
sentence.Network_cn: 全文围绕唐代宫怨诗的艺术风貌这一中心来展开.

sentence.Network_en: The effect of root on soil respiration was observed mainly before repining stage with fluctuation.
sentence.Network_cn: 种有水稻,根系对土壤总的呼吸影响主要体现在成熟期之前,且有相互消长的现象.

list.abs: immigrants who repined for their homeland .渴望回到故土的移民们
He repined against his unhappy lot ., 他自叹命运多舛.
The old woman repined at her misfortune ., 那老妇人怨叹不幸的遭遇.
WHY , why repine , my pensive friend ., 我沉思的朋友 , 为何 , 为何抱怨.

auth_sentence.content: Repining, wrote Newhall, is a futile activity.
auth_sentence.res_content: Repining, wrote Newhall, is a futile activity.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Repining, wrote Newhall, is a futile activity.

auth_sentence.content: I don't say this isn't a...nuisance...Still, repining won't get us anywhere.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: I don't say this isn't a...nuisance...Still, repining won't get us anywhere.
